item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description:
white background extends all the way for me in FF 1.0.6.
I can imagine that would look really annoying to you. :)
try a forced refresh? (ctrl F5) otherwise, hell if i know.
BUT! I do see goofiness in IE related to a div issue. (what. a. shock.)
Bleh, now I see it. Couldn't because I was logged in under FF. *calls in the intern!*
Known issue -- discussion <a href="http://flickr.com/groups/binarybonsai/discuss/83605/">here</a> (for my reference)
(Again for my reference, IE sidebar fix <a href="http://flickr.com/groups/binarybonsai/discuss/76285/">here</a> -- r73 was supposed to have IE fix included, maybe didn't make it into release or didn't work.)
Temp fix: changed backgrounds to white, no one's the wiser. Temp fix 2: stepped back to r60, appears correct in FF and IE (with search bar out of place in IE).
Fix ID'd for next RC (div issues with .commentauthor)
item.content:encoded:
white background extends all the way for me in FF 1.0.6.

I can imagine that would look really annoying to you. ðŸ™‚

try a forced refresh? (ctrl F5) otherwise, hell if i know.

BUT! I do see goofiness in IE related to a div issue. (what. a. shock.)

Bleh, now I see it. Couldn’t because I was logged in under FF. *calls in the intern!*

Known issue — discussion here (for my reference)

(Again for my reference, IE sidebar fix here — r73 was supposed to have IE fix included, maybe didn’t make it into release or didn’t work.)

Temp fix: changed backgrounds to white, no one’s the wiser.
Temp fix 2: stepped back to r60, appears correct in FF and IE (with search bar out of place in IE).

Fix ID’d for next RC (div issues with .commentauthor)

item.title: By: jiffy
item.dc:creator: jiffy
item.description: Nono, layout wise. Look at this page in IE, then look at it in FF. The white BG + green border ends at the title of the blog post. It does not extend downward to cover the entire post and the comments. It's probably a div tag height issue. IE doesn't care, but FF does. I think.
item.content:encoded: Nono, layout wise. Look at this page in IE, then look at it in FF. The white BG + green border ends at the title of the blog post. It does not extend downward to cover the entire post and the comments. It’s probably a div tag height issue. IE doesn’t care, but FF does. I think.

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description: Might have been a server issue cuz I'm not seeing that now. Server's been crap for weeks, but supposedly going to be resolved substantially by tomorrow night.
item.content:encoded: Might have been a server issue cuz I’m not seeing that now. Server’s been crap for weeks, but supposedly going to be resolved substantially by tomorrow night.

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.content:encoded:
Hiding To Do list here, plus I can test commenting. (I so clever.)

Tag plugin
Recent comments in sidebar
Archives page – ELA (goddamn, those are slick!)
Favatars not working for comments
Header graphic of some sort. (what to steal, what to steal … Maxell, I have you now!)
Cuss out guild anyway cuz this shit is taking WAY too long
Noteworthy plugin (to come in next RC)
Get a ban stick ready for anyone that rags about the color scheme
Blockquote problem in comments (dammit, it’s always something)
Search link on back pages + custom sidebars … err, maybe
Asides graphics
Word count to archive page (because more is always better)
WTF is up with fancy tooltips now?
